body.p: This publication outlines a procedure how to create an AES master key on a configured in coprocessor mode (shortly referred to as ) using the () workstation. The is connected to an mainframe that runs an instance of .

section.title: What this document describes
section.p: There are multiple master key types and different methods how to create and set these keys using capabilities. This document focuses on the creation and setting of an AES master key on a coprocessor.

section.title: What this document does not describe
section.p: This document does not describe the complete process of setting up a comprehensive security concept, nor does it demonstrate all security features available from the workstation.

section.title: Further information
section.p: For information about sophisticated features, for example, for using domain groups, refer to the Trusted Key Entry Workstation User's Guide (SC14-7511) from the IBM Resource Link or from the IBM Knowledge Center.
